title: Border, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in running and chain stitches on plain weave
creditline: Gift of Provident Securities Company from the Estate of Mr. and Mrs. William H. Crocker
description: Narrow strip cut from a bed curtain, with design of pairs of leaves in red, green, purple and grey on natural.

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
